name: Brave Bomb
description:
Brave Bomb is a twitch reflex speed game where you must collect the heart in 5 seconds or you'll blow up.

MAY THE GODS OF RNG BE EVER IN YOUR FAVOR.

Controls :

MoveWASDDashSPACE BARPauseENTER / ESC

Game play:

Collect the heart before the timer runs out to survive. Avoid obstacles as you run for your goal.

Notice:

Some browsers may not be able to run the game. Please try out another browser if this is the case.

Made for the 2020 PROTOSHI prototyping competition. ( Game 1- ADVANCED )

Designed by iamdavidnight
